traits.appearance: has a distinctive posture (crooked or rigid)
traits.abilities: is powerful, brawny, and strong as an ox, but is oblivious and absentminded

personality.mannerism: Uses big words to sound intelligent but uses incorrectly
personality.interaction: Thinks of the Party as friends

voice.vocals: Speaks Slowly, at a High pitch.
voice.quirk: mouth is always full when talking
